Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.GodController

Class GodController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.GodController.GodController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApolloController, ArtemisController, AthenaController, AtlasController, DemeterController, HephaestusController, MinotaurController, PanController, PrometheusController
public abstract class GodController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Interface used to implement a Strategy Pattern regarding the special effect of the God card
